everything and everything is just
controlled think about the internet for

it's controlled well certain ports parts

can they can have an influence they can
team up with the developers they can do

like cryptocurrency just like the
blockchain bitcoin is just one piece
aetherium is just one piece a theorem
yes makes up a lot of the coins it's
part of the coding but same same thing

nobody can control it the same thing

they're not looking to control the

the alternative media was going to gain

they control and they thought everyone
would continually use the corporate

with Bitcoin and other coins that are

they want governments to acknowledge

they can care less about somebody else

away the technology part and all that

this is why they've been demonizing

and there's many different functions to

controlling my website I built it I put

actually if I wanted more control I

control
over it well cryptocurrencies you have

a controlled people's currency without
the central banking system we see
case-shiller right now is reporting from
their 20-city composite home price index
that prices of homes they are rising
very very quickly now this is very
interesting because they have surpassed
the July 2006 record high we're past
that right now
and we're about three point eight times
higher than the everyday worker pay
which means the younger first-time
homebuyers they're gonna have a very

we're seeing a huge amount of inflation
in homes where they're pumping up the

this is going to be a major major

rates rise the same things going to

we can see how out of whack this is I
mean go to Los Angeles it's a hundred
twenty two percent over the national
level of income
if we look at San Francisco it's 107
percent New York is 95 percent above
this is completely unaffordable for the
next generation and that's what this is
all about it's the next generation and
if we go back in time we can see that
each generation it got harder and harder
and harder as time went on and here we
are at the endgame and it's very
difficult people for people if we go

prior to that well we didn't really see
much inflation more on the gold standard
we saw inflation right after we came off
of the gold standard and they started to
create a lot of currency that's where we
saw the inflation if you look at 1970s
going to the 80s housing prices boom
they just went up very very high if you
look at wages boom they had to be
readjusted because of what was happening
now we're at the opposite end wages are
not moving up as quickly actually
they're declining in many areas but the
housing prices they are continually
being pushed up the stock market is
continually being pushed up this is
being done because people feel good when
the housing prices are at their highest
people feel good when the stock market
is very high and it used to work where
everything was great because wages were
keeping up but we're at the point now
where they've disconnected and now the
everyday person was coming out of

end stage of an economy that is breaking
down where they can't raise interest
rates where wages they're pretty much
flatlined where we see bubbles all over
the place and bubbles are popping people
can't afford things because what happens
is you can keep you keep creating these
this currency over and over and over and
before you know it it devalues the
currency and they call this inflation
and it takes a lot more of those dollars
to afford anything and this is why we're
going to see this completely get out of
control as time goes on now we just
talked about this yesterday about the
Italian banks and we talked about how
they're in really big trouble most of
these banks are completely in some the
central banks
been propping them up and they are
imploding right now and it's just funny
that we just talked about this yesterday
I mean Italy they woke up to a shear
selling panic now we talked about this
yesterday where everyone's gonna be
looking at the situation they're gonna
be margin calls they're gonna be all
these things happening and people are
gonna start to sell and we saw a huge
sell-off which mutated into a full-blown
liquidation avalanche led by a furious
repricing of the btp curve where two
year yields exploded another 170 basis
points higher on the day of rising to
2.60% from a negative just a few days
ago now this is a complete and utter
disaster now we haven't seen anything
like this since the days of the European
sovereign debt crisis in 2011 2012 and
what happened was dealers they pulled
their price indication dealers were
unwilling to trade giving the excessive
volatility and what we're seeing right
now is going to get a lot worse because
yesterday we reported on how there are
many many other banks that are tied into

Deutsche Bank while their stock just

spread beyond Italy's borders and it's
going to get a lot worse and this is
just the beginning stages of the
economic meltdown now will the central
bank's stepped in and will they create

maybe they will but what we can see from
all of this is that everything is
starting to break down right now and the
central banks what's going to happen is
they're gonna go into overdrive
instead of unwinding cutting QE they're
gonna switch gears and they're gonna
create more QE because they start to
realize what is happening here and
they're gonna try to save these banks
and save what is happening because they
want to be in control of this whole
thing coming down and I believe what's
happening here is there's holes in the
dam and they're putting fingers on the
dam and they're trying to hold
everything together and it's all falling
apart remember
they've been telling us that these banks
are strong you don't have to worry about
the derivative market everything is
great the economy is fine we're gonna
start to unwind we don't need the QE
anymore well everything's falling apart
very very quickly and they're gonna have

they let it go the world is gonna be
looking at the central bank's saying
what just happened here you told us it
was contained you told us everything was
fine that the economy was strong and we

but we can see this is not true we can
see that it's all breaking down very
very quickly and again the central banks
they don't want them for this and this

and before you know it all these holes

they're not gonna be able to stop it and

this is just the beginning of the

the same thing is going to happen and
we're gonna be going through a

come the debt that is out there cannot

talking about the central banking says
only lasts for a certain period of time

that's where we're headed right now but
what we need to do is we need to make

purchase and
and whatnot and you can see right now
